languages.text: "Осторожнее, осторожнее. Бережнее с наш{mf|им|ей} гост{mf|ем|ьей} — {mf|ему|ей} предстоит исполнить важную миссию в Камере {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патента{/g}, а для этого {mf|ему|ей} следует быть жив{mf|ым|ой}". {n}Кунрад опускает взгляд на вас.{/n} "Вы вернулись к нам. Какая радость".

traits.locale_text: "Осторожнее, осторожнее. Бережнее с наш{mf|им|ей} гост{mf|ем|ьей} — {mf|ему|ей} предстоит исполнить важную миссию в Камере {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патента{/g}, а для этого {mf|ему|ей} следует быть жив{mf|ым|ой}?" {n}Кунрад опускает взгляд на вас.{/n} "Вы вернулись к нам. Какая радость".

languages.text: "Careful! Careful! Be gentle with our guest — {mf|he|she} has an important mission to complete during our visit to the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} Chamber, and for that I need {mf|him|her} breathing." {n}Voigtvir looks down at you.{/n} "You are back with us, I see. Delightful."
languages.original_text: "Осторожнее, осторожнее. Бережнее с наш{mf|им|ей} гост{mf|ем|ьей} — {mf|ему|ей} предстоит исполнить важную миссию в Камере {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Патента{/g}, а для этого {mf|ему|ей} следует быть жив{mf|ым|ой}". {n}Кунрад опускает взгляд на вас.{/n} "Вы вернулись к нам. Какая радость".

traits.locale_text: "Careful! Careful! Be gentle with our great heir of House von Valancius! Are you not aware of the important mission that this esteemed figure is to complete during our visit to the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} Chamber?" {n}Voigtvir leans forward and peers into your face.{/n} "You are back with us, I see. Delightful."

"Careful! Careful! Be gentle with our great heir of House von Valancius! Are you not aware of the important mission that this esteemed figure is to complete during our visit to the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} Chamber?" {n}Voigtvir leans forward and peers into your face.{/n} "You are back with us, I see. Delightful."

"Careful! Careful! Be gentle with our guest — {mf|he|she} has an important mission to complete during our visit to the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} Chamber, and for that I need {mf|him|her} breathing." {n}Voigtvir looks down at you.{/n} "You are back with us, I see. Delightful."

"Careful! Careful! Be gentle with our guest — {mf|he|she} has an important mission to complete during our visit to the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} Chamber, and for that I need {mf|him|her} breathing." {n}Voigtvir looks down at you.{/n} "You are back with us, I see. Delightful."

languages.text: “当心！当心！对我们的客人温柔一些。我们前往{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}授状{/g}大厅期间，{mf|他|她}还有个重要的任务要完成呢。为此，我需要{mf|他|她}活着。”{n}维特威尔居高临下地看着你。{/n}“你回来了。很好，我很高兴。”
languages.original_text: "Careful! Careful! Be gentle with our guest — {mf|he|she} has an important mission to complete during our visit to the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} Chamber, and for that I need {mf|him|her} breathing." {n}Voigtvir looks down at you.{/n} "You are back with us, I see. Delightful."

traits.locale_text: “当心！当心！对我们的客人温柔一些。我们前往{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}许可证{/g}大厅期间，{mf|他|她}还有个重要的任务要完成呢。为此，我需要{mf|他|她}活着。”{n}维特威尔居高临下地看着你。{/n}“你回来了。很好，我很高兴。”

languages.text: «¡Cuidado! ¡Cuidado! Tratad bien a nuestr{mf|o|a} invitad{mf|o|a}: tiene una misión importante que cumplir durante nuestra visita a la sala de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente{/g}, y necesitará seguir respirando para ello». {n}Voigtvir te lanza una mirada de desprecio.{/n} «Ya veo que ha vuelto con nosotros. Magnífico».
languages.original_text: "Careful! Careful! Be gentle with our guest — {mf|he|she} has an important mission to complete during our visit to the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} Chamber, and for that I need {mf|him|her} breathing." {n}Voigtvir looks down at you.{/n} "You are back with us, I see. Delightful."

traits.locale_text: «¡Cuidado! ¡Cuidado! Tratad bien a nuestr{mf|o|a} invitad{mf|o|a}: tiene una misión importante que cumplir durante nuestra visita a la sala de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Patente{/g}, y necesitará seguir respirando para ello». {n}Voigtvir te lanza una mirada de desprecio.{/n} «Ya veo que ha vuelto con nosotros. Magnífico».

languages.text: 「気を付けて！気を付けて！お客様は丁重に…{mf|彼|彼女}には{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}部屋訪問中に果たさなければならない重要な使命があるのです。そのために、{mf|彼|彼女}には息をしていてもらわなければ困るんだ」{n}ボイトヴィルはあなたを見下ろす。{/n}「戻って来たのか、そうか。それは良かった」
languages.original_text: "Careful! Careful! Be gentle with our guest — {mf|he|she} has an important mission to complete during our visit to the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} Chamber, and for that I need {mf|him|her} breathing." {n}Voigtvir looks down at you.{/n} "You are back with us, I see. Delightful."

traits.locale_text: 「気を付けて！気を付けて！お客様には丁重に…{mf|彼|彼女}には{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}室訪問中に完了しなければならない重要な使命があるのです。そのために、{mf|彼|彼女}には息をしていてもらわなければ困るんだ」{n}ボイドヴィルはあなたを見下ろす。{/n}「戻って来たのか、そうか。それは良かった」
「気を付けて！気を付けて！お客様は丁重に…{mf|彼|彼女}には{g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}令状{/g}部屋訪問中に果たさなければならない重要な使命があるのです。そのために、{mf|彼|彼女}には息をしていてもらわなければ困るんだ」{n}ボイトヴィルはあなたを見下ろす。{/n}「戻って来たのか、そうか。それは良かった」

languages.text: « Attention ! Attention ! Ne maltraitez pas notre {mf|invité. Il|invitée. Elle} a une mission importante à accomplir lors de notre visite dans la salle de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g}. J'ai besoin {mf|de lui vivant|d'elle vivante}, {n}déclare Voigtvir, puis il baisse les yeux vers vous.{/n} Ah, je vois que vous êtes de retour parmi nous. Excellent. »
languages.original_text: "Careful! Careful! Be gentle with our guest — {mf|he|she} has an important mission to complete during our visit to the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} Chamber, and for that I need {mf|him|her} breathing." {n}Voigtvir looks down at you.{/n} "You are back with us, I see. Delightful."

traits.locale_text: « Attention ! Attention ! Ne maltraitez pas notre {mf|invité. Il|invitée. Elle} a une mission importante à accomplir lors de notre visite dans la salle de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}lettre de marque{/g}. J'ai besoin {mf|de lui vivant|d'elle vivante}, {n}déclare Voigtvir, puis il baisse les yeux vers vous.{/n} Ah, je vois que vous êtes de retour parmi nous. Excellent. »

languages.text: "Vorsicht! Vorsicht! Geht sanft mit unserem Gast um – {mf|er|sie} hat eine wichtige Mission bei unserem Besuch der {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbriefkammer{/g}, und dabei muss {mf|er|sie} noch atmen." {n}Voigtvir blickt auf dich hinab.{/n} "Ihr seid wieder bei uns, wie ich sehe. Sehr schön."
languages.original_text: "Careful! Careful! Be gentle with our guest — {mf|he|she} has an important mission to complete during our visit to the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} Chamber, and for that I need {mf|him|her} breathing." {n}Voigtvir looks down at you.{/n} "You are back with us, I see. Delightful."

Geht sanft mit unserem Gast um – {mf|er|sie} hat eine wichtige Mission bei unserem Besuch der {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Handelsbrief{/g}kammer, und dabei muss {mf|er|sie} noch atmen." {n}Voigtvir blickt auf dich hinab.{/n} "Ihr seid wieder bei uns, wie ich sehe. languages.original_text: "Careful! Careful! Be gentle with our guest — {mf|he|she} has an important mission to complete during our visit to the {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Warrant{/g} Chamber, and for that I need {mf|him|her} breathing." {n}Voigtvir looks down at you.{/n} "You are back with us, I see. Delightful."

languages.text: "Aman dikkat! Dikkat! Konuğumuza nazik davranın. {g|Encyclopedia:Warrant}Ruhsatname{/g} Odası ziyaretimizde yerine getirmesi gereken önemli bir vazifesi var. Bunun için de hâliyle nefes alması gerek." {n}Voigtvir, tepene dikilmiş sana bakıyor.{/n} "Aramıza dönmüşsün. Ne hoş."
languages.original_text: "Careful! Careful! Delightful."
